articles.author: Jason Owens
articles.title: LeBron James criticizes NBA officials in response to fan's conspiracy theory: 'Frustrating as hell' - Yahoo Sports
articles.description: To be fair, the incident in question was clearly a foul. But does James really believe that the NBA is actively out to get its most marketable franchise?
articles.content:
Criticizing officials is in vogue.
A day after Joey Bosa sounded off on NFL officiating, LeBron James had his own words for NBA referees.
James tweeted some likely fine-worthy criticism Monday. His… [+3293 chars]
